Valid_Email: This field must be a valid email
Valid_Cpf: This field must be a valid CPF
Valid_Cnpj: This field must be a valid CNPJ
Valid_Min_Length: This field must have at least {requiredLength} characters
Valid_Max_Length: This field must have at most {requiredLength} characters
Valid_Min_Value: This field must be greater or equal to {min}
Valid_Max_Value: This field must be less or equal to {max}
Max_Files_Reached: Limit of {maxFiles} files reached, rest ignored.
